CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| BDT |
| Thiophene |
| Di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione (TDPP) |
| 2-vinylthiophenyl |

Note: The material names are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| TDPP |
| BDT |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material names and were removed:

* "thiophene" (not a specific material name, but a class of compounds)
* "di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione" (too long and complex to be considered a material name)
* "2-vinylthiophenyl" (not a specific material name, but a chemical structure)

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 2a Here we report another novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer ( PBDT-TDPP-S ) for highperformance PSCs , in which the BDT and thiophene units are conjugatedly formed the main chain and the di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione ( TDPP ) units are pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain by a linkage of a 2-vinylthiophenyl unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| BDT |
| thiophene |
| di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione (TDPP) |
| 2-vinylthiophenyl |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| TDPP |
| 2-vinylthiophenyl |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph:

* PBDT-TDPP-S: a novel sidechain D-A conjugated copolymer
* TDPP: di(thiophen-2yl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione, a unit pended onto the thiophenyl units to build the side chain
* 2-vinylthiophenyl: a unit used to form the linkage between the thiophenyl units and the main chain.
